original: Melin, Gunnar Rickard Hennin". advokat, Göteborg, f. 26/10/06 i Hjär-tum, Gbgs o. Boh. 1., av kronojäg. Henning M. o. Olga Glimstedt. G. 39 m. Anna Maria Wingren. Barn: Margareta f. 40, Erik 41, Björn 43. . — Stud:ex. i Gbg 28, jur. kand. i Sthim 35. Tingstjg. i Nordals, Sundals o. Valbo här. doms. 35-38, anst. å Gunnar Berghs Adv :byrå i Gbg 38. Led. av Sv :es adv :S’amf. sed. 40.
translated: Melin, Gunnar Rickard Hennin", lawyer, Gothenburg, b. 26/10/06 in Hjärtum, Gothenburg and Bohuslän county, son of the crown hunter Henning M. and Olga Glimstedt. Married in 1939 to Anna Maria Wingren. Children: Margareta b. 1940, Erik b. 1941, Björn b. 1943. - Completed secondary education in Gothenburg in 1928, obtained a law degree in Stockholm in 1935. Served as a court clerk in the districts of Nordal, Sundal, and Valbo from 1935 to 1938, employed at Gunnar Bergh's law firm in Gothenburg in 1938. Member of the Swedish Bar Association since 1940.
